model

Class EquivalenceclassMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.EquivalenceclassMapper

  • class EquivalenceclassMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper class for the mapping function of a digram. Each Digram needs a function which maps form a node and an old equivalenceClass to a new equivalenceClass. This function is implemented by this class.
    Author:
    Matthias DÃ¼rksen
    See Also:
    Digram

    • Method Detail

      • getNewEquivalenceClass

        public int getNewEquivalenceClass(GraphNode node,
                                  int oldEquivalenceClass)
        Gets the new EquivalenceClass for a node an its EquivalenceClass.
        Parameters:
        node - the node which the new Equivalence class is to be calculated for.
        oldEquivalenceClass - the old Equivalence class which the new Equivalence class is to be calculated for.
        Returns:
        the new Equivalence class for the node and old Equivalence class.

      • getOldEquivalenceClass

        public Tuple<GraphNode,java.lang.Integer> getOldEquivalenceClass(int newEquivalenceClass)
        Gets the old EquivalenceClass and the node for an EquivalenceClass. Only required for decompression.
        Parameters:
        newEquivalenceClass - the EquivalenceClass which the result is to be calculated for.
        Returns:
        the old EquivalenceClass and the node as a Tuple for the newEquivalenceClass.

      • updateFunction

        public void updateFunction(Occurrence occurrence)
        Does all necessary updates on the mapping function for a new occurrence.
        Parameters:
        occurrence - the new occurrence.

      • functionIndexOf

        private int functionIndexOf(GraphNode node,
                            int equivalenceclass)
        Gets the local index in the mapping function for the node and the equivalenceclass.
        Parameters:
        node - the node which the index is to be calculated for.
        equivalenceclass - the equivalenceclass which the index is to be calculated for.
        Returns:
        the index of the local mapping function which simultaneously corresponds to the new equivalenceClass of the node and the equivalenceClass.
